Title: Lady and the Tramp 2: Scamp's Adventure
Writer: Bill Motz (screenplay), Bob Roth (screenplay), Tom Rogers (additional screenplay material), Flip Kobler (additional screenplay material), Cindy Marcus (additional screenplay material), Ward Greene (characters)
Actors: Scott Wolf, Alyssa Milano, Chazz Palminteri, Jeff Bennett
Plot: Seeking the freedom to be a wild dog, the son of Lady and the Tramp runs away to join a gang of junkyard dogs.
